channel.title: Item Duping
channel.description:
Hi I have a problem, Im making a new server but I know theres people that can duplicate items without being admin or mod, I need help becouse I wanna know how they do this for 2 things: 1-. Curiosity 2-. I have a program to stop the use of programs on servers so i wanna know what program or what they use to stop it.
thanks If you tell me ill be very thankfull and make you admin on my server

item.title: Item Duping
item.dc:creator: @renatoavalos renatoavalos
item.description:
@renatoavalos wrote:

but how do they dupe wothout the setitem

Read full topic

item.title: Item Duping
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:5, topic:117427”]Thats not item duping.
Thats item id switching.
Item duping is having one item then making many copies all based off that one.
And the AutoRune Dupe Bug was actually a creation bug.[/quote]
this still counts as item duping coz u can get bow string turn it into a phat then u sell shop bill times coz it dont disapear and hardly no1 would notice and they have inf cash phats etc so its kinda duping

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @renatoavalos renatoavalos
item.description:
@renatoavalos wrote:

yep but with the artmoney im not worry you cant so anything with your duped stuff

item.title: Item Duping
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Thats not item duping.
Thats item id switching.
Item duping is having one item then making many copies all based off that one.
And the AutoRune Dupe Bug was actually a creation bug.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Duping
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“setitem”)) { // ban command

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::setitem");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Auto-Ban did hes job … !”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You , Tom”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}[/code]

Read full topic
